verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You fill up my spirit As I take time to know You. When I stand here inside You And call on Your name. You come and You love me, You’re my joy and my sorrow. I sit in Your presence And love You again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Jesus I love You, May I always be with You. Let me cry in Your presence, Let me die in Your arms. It’s all my desire To give my life to You. You fill up my spirit, I’m Yours once again.{/lang-eng}
